div.div:
On Monday, March 23 from 11:30 am to 1:00 pm we will have milk, juice and limited fresh produce available at the following site:
Mountain Empire High School
Items will be available in limited quantities. Please bring your own bags or boxes. The items will be available in a drive-thru fashion and there will be no exiting of vehicles or walk-up service. Please follow the signs at your preferred location.

a.title: Citizens Bond Oversight Committee
a.div:
The Board of Education is inviting community members to apply to serve on the District’s Citizens’ Bond Oversight Committee, which is being established as a result of at least 55 percent of voters in the District voting in favor of Measure JJ at the November 6, 2018 election. Proposition 39 requires that such a committee be established if a school bond is passed pursuant to a 55 percent (super-majority) approval.
Please click on this message for the application.

a.title: Procedures, Policies and Guidelines
a.div: Citizens' Oversight Committee Procedures, Policies and Guidelines

div.div:
MEUSD Online Registration!
Online Registration enables parents and guardians to register their students online. To complete registration online for returning Students, an Aeries Parent Portal account is required. If you currently do not have an account, please contact your School Site Secretary for assistance.
Returning Students:
RE-ENROLL a CURRENT Student
New Students:
Enroll a NEW student

a.title: Charter School Transcripts
a.div: The Transcript Request Form is available for Eagles Peak and San Diego Neighborhood Charter School past students and graduates who need their academic records forwarded to a college or employer. Click on this message to go to the form.

span.data-emptytext: Mountain Empire Unified School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Mountain Empire Unified School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.

p.span: Mountain Empire Unified School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
